Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: Green foothills rise to the east, eventually ending at the great mountains.
Room.LongDescription: To the southwest is the hot and searing K'tral Desert, a forbidding buffer to the even worse badlands many kilometers to the south. There is an old caravan trail through the K'tral, and occasionally the desert has swallowed a few caravans without a trace. The caravan trail runs south of Prince Ragnar's splendid castle.
